intro.short_bio: I am a passionate software developer specializing in cybersecurity, networking, and backend systems.
intro.about_text: Computer Engineering student with a strong interest in cybersecurity, networking, and low-level programming. This is my personal space where I share technical projects and learning experiences.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.http_server: Development from scratch of an HTTP server capable of handling GET, POST, and OPTIONS requests, using sockets and threads in C and manual HTTP header handling.
projects.films_api: Creation of a REST API with endpoints for movies, shopping carts, and clients. Session management and authentication. Docker container deployment.
projects.library_api: Implementation of two independent microservices for user and file library management. Includes custom token-based authentication, endpoint protection, and Docker deployment.
projects.libpcap: Ethernet and ARP traffic analysis tool with custom implementation of: Frame capture and analysis with libpcap. Sending and processing ARP requests/replies. Gratuitous ARP and cache management with lock synchronization. Validation in virtual network (Mininet) with documented tests.
